definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: “Are you aware how many people have been killed in Kashmir?
sentences.chinese: 你知不知道有多少人在可設米爾喪生？

sentences.english: Initial reports indicate that seven crewmembers were killed in the crash.
sentences.chinese: 初步報告顯示，有7名機組人員在空難中喪生。

sentences.english: Nearly 30,000 people have been killed since the campaign began.
sentences.chinese: 自從緝毒戰開始以來，已有近3萬人喪生。

sentences.english: Six are said to have been killed, and 11 wounded.
sentences.chinese: 據說，已有六個人喪生，11人受傷。

sentences.english: The fly that sips treacle is lost in the sweet.
sentences.chinese: 啜飲密糖的蒼蠅在甜蜜中喪生。

sentences.english: So far eight people have died from flooding in Michigan and Indiana.
sentences.chinese: 至今密歇根州和印第安納州已有八人因洪水喪生。

sentences.english: The United States strongly condemns the act of aggression that led to their deaths.
sentences.chinese: 美國強烈譴責導致這些水兵喪生的侵略行徑。

sentences.english: Dozens of students were killed when the Juyuan Middle School collapsed in Dujiangyan.
sentences.chinese: 許多學生在都江堰聚源中學的坍塌中喪生。

sentences.english: Five more deaths were reported overnight.
And there was 37 people died in there.
Almost a hundred people perished in the hotel fire last night.
sentences.chinese: 近百人在昨夜旅館的大火中喪生。

sentences.english: Jack asks the Palmers to pretend that the Senator was killed.
sentences.chinese: 傑克向帕默一家人請求，假裝帕默在爆炸中喪生了。

sentences.english: Among those killed was the top U.N. official in Iraq - Sergio Vieira de Mello.
sentences.chinese: 喪生的人員中包括聯合國駐巴格達最高官員德梅洛。

sentences.english: Most of those killed were in the county seat, also known as Jyeku.
sentences.chinese: 在地震中喪生者大多居住在縣城。

sentences.english: In the post-vote unrest, 20 people were killed and many others were injured.
sentences.chinese: 在選舉之後的動盪中，有20人喪生，許多人受傷。

sentences.english: Most of the 170-plus victims died during that time.
sentences.chinese: 至少有170個受害者在襲擊中喪生。

definition: to die in an accident or disaster/to be killed
to die in the line of duty
(of an airplane etc) to fall to the ground and crash
to be wounded/to sustain an injury
to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
